name: Rothé

trait.name: Charge
text: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

description:
Ordinary rothé resemble musk oxen and have darkvision out to a range of 30 feet.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 208
